Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model

Class GoldCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model.PlaceableCard
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model.ResourceCard
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.model.GoldCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GoldCard extends ResourceCard
This class represents all the gold cards. It extends the ResourceCard class. It contains the resources required to play the card, the points for corners, the points for items, the item required plus the ResourceCard attributes.
See Also:
